title: Beats & Burritos
typeOfFood: American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Features Californian-Mexican food with build-your-own approach. On the menu are burritos, tacos, and salads with vegetarian, vegan, or meat variants. A fully equipped bar is in the back lounge with beers and music. Conveniently located in a touristy area, since 2015.
